verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H216>light<s%> and my <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> <S%H4310>Whom<s%> shall I <S%H3372>fear<s%>? The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4581>defense<s%> of my <S%H9132>life;<s%> <S%H4310>Whom<s%> shall I <S%H6342>dread<s%>?

When <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> upon me to <S%H398>devour<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> My <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> and my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fell.<s%>

<S%H518>Though<s%> a <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, My <S%H3820>heart<s%> will not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> <S%H518>Though<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, In [spite of] <S%H384>this<s%> I shall be <S%H982>confident.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H259>thing<s%> I have <S%H7592>asked<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that I shall <S%H1245>seek:<s%> That I may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H9132>life,<s%> To <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H5278>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And to <S%H1239>meditate<s%> in His <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

For in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9567>trouble<s%> He will <S%H6845>conceal<s%> me in His <S%H5520>tabernacle;<s%> In the <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H5643>place<s%> of His <S%H168>tent<s%> He will <S%H5641>hide<s%> me; He will <S%H7311>lift<s%> me up on a <S%H6697>rock.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> will be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up <S%H5921>above<s%> my <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> me; And I will <S%H2076>offer<s%> in His <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> with <S%H8643>shouts<s%> of <S%H8643>joy;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> yes, I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> And be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to me and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.
[When Thou didst say,] <S%H1245>"Seek<s%> My <S%H6440>face,<s%>" my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to Thee, "Thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I shall <S%H1245>seek.<s%>"

Do not <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me, Do not <S%H5186>turn<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> in <S%H639>anger;<s%> Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help;<s%> Do not <S%H5203>abandon<s%> me <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation!<s%>
For my father and my <S%H1>mother<s%> have <S%H517>forsaken<s%> me, But the <S%H5800>Lord<s%> will <S%H3068>take<s%> me up.
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me Thy <S%H1870>way,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in a <S%H4334>level<s%> <S%H734>path,<s%> <S%H4616>Because<s%> of my <S%H9596>foes.<s%>

Do not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me over to the <S%H5315>desire<s%> of my <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> For <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> have <S%H6965>risen<s%> against me, And such as <S%H3307>breathe<s%> out <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

[I would have despaired] <S%H3884>unless<s%> I had <S%H539>believed<s%> that I would <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H6960>Wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H553>take<s%> <S%H553>courage;<s%> Yes, <S%H6960>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
